title: Shuttle Art 112 Colours Polymer Clay, Soft Oven Bake Modeling Clay Kit, 16 Kinds of Accessories, Non-Stick, Non-Toxic, Ideal Polymer Clay Molds Kit DIY Art Craft Gift for Kids Adults
features: 112 COLOURS POLYMER CLAY KIT: Shuttle Art polymer clay set contains 112 vibrant colours of 20g/block oven bake clay, together with 20 useful clay tools and 16 kinds of accessories. Ideal modeling clay for both kids and adults to make small ornaments, model animals, characters, etc

COMPLETE CLAY TOOLS & CREATIVE ACCESSORIES: Comes with complete clay tools, scraper, bells, beads, earring hooks, hairpin holder, ring holders, key ring, gem silicone mold, needles, mobile phone chains, user manual, and more. Unleash your creativity with 20 polymer clay tools and 16 kinds of accessories to create clay earrings or a necklace with polymer clay beads, an ornament, a jewelry holder, a keychain, and more

SAFE & GIFTABLE: Strictly Conform to ASTM D-4236, ASTM F2923-20 & EN71 Standards and Requirements. Non-toxic, non-fragrance, safe, and suitable for children age 3+. With a fancy box, it is suitable for giving presents on Christmas, birthdays, and any other festivals. (WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD---Small parts, not for children under 12 yrs. Contains sharp objects that may cause injury )

BAKE METHOD: 1.Oven Bake (Recommend, oven set temperature of 130 ° C (266 ° F) and bake 10-15 minutes). 2.Boil method (suitable small works size in 1/3 inch). 3.Hair Blower Heating (Suitable small works size in 1-2 inch). Don't microwave

SERVICE GUARANTEE: Your satisfaction is our top priority, please rest assured to purchase our products. If you are not satisfied with our products or have any questions, please feel free to contact us at any time
